Package main.java.it.unipr.sql

Class BoatDAO

java.lang.Object
main.java.it.unipr.sql.BoatDAO
public class BoatDAO extends Object
The class BoatDAO defines a model for the management of the query of the entity Boats of the database.
Author:
Martina Gualtieri <martina.gualtieri@studenti.unipr.it>, Cristian Cervellera <cristian.cervellera@studenti.unipr.it>

  • Method Details

    • getAllBoats

      public ArrayList<Boat> getAllBoats(User owner)
      Gets the list of all the boats. If the member passed as parameter is different from null returns the list of the boats owned by the user.
      Parameters:
      owner - the owner of the boats.
      Returns:
      the list.

    • getAllNameBoatsByOwner

      public ArrayList<String> getAllNameBoatsByOwner(User owner)
      Gets a list with the name of all the boats owned by a member user.
      Parameters:
      owner - the member user who owns the boats.
      Returns:
      the list.

    • getBoatByName

      public Boat getBoatByName(String name, User owner)
      Gets a boat of a club member given the name of the boat.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the boat.
      owner - the owner of the boat.
      Returns:
      the reference of the boat or null.

    • getBoatById

      public Boat getBoatById(int id)
      Gets a boat given the unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the boat.
      Returns:
      the reference of the boat or null.

    • insertBoat

      public void insertBoat(String name, int length, User user)
      Inserts a new boat in the database.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the boat.
      length - the length of the boat.
      user - the owner of the boat.

    • updateBoat

      public void updateBoat(int id, String name, Integer length)
      Updates the information of a boat.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the boat.
      name - the new name of the boat.
      length - the new length of the boat.

    • removeBoat

      public void removeBoat(int id)
      Removes a boat from the database.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the boat.

    • getMaxBoatsNumber

      public int getMaxBoatsNumber()
      Gets the maximum number of boats. Considers a boat for each user and then calculates the maximum number.
      Returns:
      the maximum number of boats or 0.
